frame.name: Accoutrements
frame.definition: <def-root>A <fen>Wearer</fen> wears accessories, which are made of some <fen>Material</fen> and may have a <fen>Style</fen>. Most of the accessories are non-essential (clothing) items. <ex><fex name="Wearer">She</fex> wore <fex name="Descriptor">a black</fex> <fex name="Material">velvet</fex> <t>hat</t> <fex name="Body_location">on her head</fex>.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Wearer
FE.definition: <def-root>The <fen>Wearer</fen> wears the <fen>Accoutrement</fen>. <ex>Why must you always wear <fex name="Wearer">your</fex> <t>helmet</t> when I'm driving?</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Style
FE.definition: <def-root>This FE identifies the <fen>Style</fen> of the <fen>Accoutrement</fen>. <ex>He wore <fex name="Style">a Jacobean</fex> <t>wig</t>.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Material
FE.definition: <def-root>This FE identifies the <fen>Material</fen> from which the <fen>Accoutrement</fen> is made.<ex>He wore a <fex name="Material">gold</fex> <t>watch</t>.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Accoutrement
FE.definition: <def-root>This FE identifies the <fen>Accoutrement</fen>. <ex>She wore a <fex name="Acout">tiara</fex>.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Descriptor
FE.definition: <def-root>This FE identifies a characteristic or description of the <fen>Accoutrement</fen>. <ex>Kim wore <fex name="Desc">an exquisite</fex> <t>tiara</t>.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Use
FE.definition:
<def-root>This FE identifies the purpose for which an <fen>Accoutrement</fen> is worn or made.
<ex>She was wearing <fex name="Use">reading</fex> <t>glasses</t>.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Part
FE.definition: <def-root>This FE identifies a part of the <fen>Accoutrement</fen>. <ex>He bought a leather <t>cap</t> <fex name="Part">with sheepskin flaps</fex>.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Body_location
FE.definition: <def-root>This FE identifies the place on the body where a particular <fen>Accoutrement</fen> is located. <ex>Tess wore a single <t>ring</t> <fex name="Body_loc">in her left nostril</fex>.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Creator
FE.definition:
<def-root>The individual or group who created the <fen>Accoutrement</fen>.
<ex>We found this <fex name="cre">Chinese</fex> <t>anklet</t> two layers below Tel-Wilaya 3.</ex> <ex><fex name="cre">De Beers</fex> <t>jewelry</t> is justly famous.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Time_of_creation
FE.definition:
<def-root>The time at which the <fen>Accoutrement</fen> was created.
<ex>What was a <fex name="tim">17th century</fex> <t>brooch</t> doing in her attic?</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Name
FE.definition:
<def-root>A name given to an individual <fen>Accoutrement</fen> to distinguish it from all other objects.
<ex>The <t>ring</t> <fex name="nam">Narya</fex> was passed to Gandalf.</ex></def-root>

lexUnit.name: broche.n
lexUnit.definition: met een speld erachter dat je op een kledingstuk kunt spelden

lexUnit.name: speldje.n
lexUnit.definition: met een klein metalen of plastic schildje met een reclametekst of afbeelding erop

lexUnit.name: medaillon.n
lexUnit.definition: voor aan een ketting die bestaat in een plat (doorgaans rond, ovaal of hartvormig) doosje waarin bijv. een fotootje bewaard kan worden

lexUnit.name: snuisterij.n
lexUnit.definition: dat meestal niet veel waarde heeft

lexUnit.name: juweel.n
lexUnit.definition: dat kostbaar is, vaak met een sieraad erin
